content: waffle drizzle socks knitting pattern about i created these socks as a palette cleanser between my more complex pairs but i didn t expect to love them so much they make perfect travel sock main pattern is very easily memorizable and you can use any scrap yarn you have laying around they are also very squishable if that s something you look for in a sock notes this pattern is worked from the top cuff down toe feel free to choose any heel and toe you want i ll provide tutorials/written patterns for what i m using just click on the hyperlink = underlined words main chart is read from bottom to top and from right to left feel free to choose different color pallets for right and left sock i think this pattern works perfectly for a mismatched pair gauge 20 sts for 5cm/2 in stockinette stitch you can of course work this pattern off gauge and just choose the circumference you usually make sizing notes body of the sock is 65 sts in circumference 33 sts on the front 32 sts on the back the chart is written for a 4 sts repeat you can adjust the size of the sock by picking a number divisible by 4 and adding 1 stitch 65 = 64 + 1 = 16x4 + 1 make sure that your chosen circumference is divisible by 5 for the ribbing yarn main color purple sandnes garn tynn peer gynt in 5023 - i used approx 20 grams for one sock ribbing color yellow drops nord in 28 and blue drops fabel in 117 purl details color pink drops nord in 13 and green sandnes garn tynn peer gynt in 8733 needles 2 25 mm needles of your preferred length for working small circumferences in the round eg dpns magic loop short circulars i used short circulars abbreviations pm - place marker k - knit sl - slip purlwise wyib sm - slip marker p - purl st s - stitch es bor - beginning of the round k2tog - knit 2 together increase d - increased mc - main color ssk - slip slip knit i like this decrease d - decreased cc - contrasting color method for a neater ssk co - cast on wyib - with yarn in the back @crochetedbybogusia - follow me on instagram so much fun stuff instructions cuff co 65 i ve used german twisted cast-on with pink/green purl details color round 1-2 knit all sts change color to yellow/blue ribbing color round 3 knit all sts round 4-22 *p1 k3 p1* repeat what s in * * till the end of round note you can make the ribbing shorter but i think longer ribbing fits this pattern best round 23 knit all sts change color to pink/green purl details color round 24 knit all sts round 25-26 purl all sts continue to the leg leg change color to purple main color work rounds 1-6 of the main
